column3: str

Regitt is jumping at shadows both real and imagined.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Search for a suspicious figure near Weathering, and with the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter “lali-ho” to announce your presence.
Report to Regitt.

I trust all is well with you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Would that I could say the same for myself. My scouts have recently spotted a suspicious figure skulking about, doubtless looking for an opportunity to abscond with our precious metals.

Make no mistake, if that scoundrel dares to step foot in my workshop, I won't hesitate to take my hammer and give whoever─or whatever─it is a walloping they won't soon forget, but I must admit I don't savor the thought of doing so. My talents lie in crafting, not combat.

You, however, are artisan and warrior both! I would ask you to patrol the area where the suspect was last sighted, and if you spot anyone, greet them with a hearty lali-ho. I pray you're able to resolve this matter with words, but if they should prove hostile, well...I'll pray for your safe return!
And just who the hells are you, eh? Quite the unsavory type, and believe me, I would know. Stay well away if you know what's good for you.

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “lali-ho” to greet the Nightshade elf.
You...you're in league with those sodding dwarves! Well, you go back to your masters and tell them one thing: Lakeland belongs to the elves─every ilm of it!
Well, well, I didn't expect to see the bleedin' hero of the realm on today of all days! To what do I owe the honor?

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “lali-ho” to greet the vigilant guard.
Oh, I know that one! That's what them dwarves over at the Anvil say, innit? A few of them came down this way and hailed me with those selfsame words.

Lali-ho! Heh heh...
Well, wherever you're headed, stay out of trouble, yeah?
Lali-ho! Ho ho!

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “lali-ho” to greet the wayward gremlin.
Lali-ho! Lali-ho, lali-ho! Ho ho ho!
The gremlin mimics the greeting repeatedly, looking quite pleased with itself as it scampers away.

Who─ Who's that!?
Oh, it's you, at last! Well, what did you find out about this intruder?

Phew, you couldn't have come with better news. Truth be told, I practically soiled myself just imagining what I might have to do with this hammer if something surly were to come this way. Out of pity for them, of course, not fear for myself!

Regardless, I'm glad we had you to check up on things for us. Always prepare for the worst, eh? Speaking of which, if any other suspicious fellows wander near the Anvil, I trust I can count on you once more.
lali-ho
